title: Lil Duval, John McCain, Old People Moments, Aretha Franklin and PETA, Comedy Roulette, Jemele Hill, JoJo The Monkey, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Steve VS Tommy, Closing Remarks and more.
itunes:title: Lil Duval, John McCain, Old People Moments, Aretha Franklin and PETA, Comedy Roulette, Jemele Hill, JoJo The Monkey, Are You Smarter Than Tommy, Steve VS Tommy, Closing Remarks and more.
description:
Steve opens up the show and speaks fondly of Lil Duval. Trump tweets about John McCain. Something funny has old man moments. Aretha Franklin will be honored the entire week by the City of Detroit. PETA wants The Queen of Soul's fur coats. Comedy Roulette talks about your nasty house. Jemele Hill parts ways with ESPN. JoJo The Monkey takes a chunk of a kids thumb. Are You Smarter Than Tommy? Steve VS Tommy. Closing Remarks today talks about fighting for your dreams and much more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
